text: Danny Blind (born 1 August 1961) is a former Dutch football player. He played for Netherlands national team. Blind is the father of professional footballer Daley Blind, who has played for Ajax and Manchester United. His son is also a Dutch international, and is one of their ten most featured players of all time with over 100 caps. ==Career statistics== Club performanceDanny Blind Level- KDirk Franciscus Blind "Danny Blind" World-Soccer.org League League Cup Cup Continental Continental Total Total Club Season League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Netherlands League League KNVB Cup KNVB Cup Europe Europe Total Total Sparta Rotterdam 1979–80 Eredivisie 13 0 2 0 -
